title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping        Glacier Bay Lodge is located along the forested shore of Bartlett Cove.        There are a number of options for accommodations while visiting Glacier Bay National Park. Glacier Bay Lodge, located within the park at Bartlett Cove is the only lodging within the park. It is open from mid-may through early September. Nearby Gustavus, Alaska is a charming community of 450 year-round residents. Scattered throughout Gustavus are a number of popular inns, lodges, and B&B's. A campground (walk-in tent) is located in the park at Bartlett Cove. Maximum stay is 14 days. For those prepared to wilderness camp and kayak, there are virtually unlimited camping opportunities.         Glacier Bay Lodge The full-service lodge within Glacier Bay National Park         Commercial Services Outfitters, guides, lodging, rentals, etc.         Gustavus, Alaska Gateway to Glacier Bay National Park
